notes: This creature was implemented to make life more difficult for botters, but was removed again in a later update.
sounds: I am a healer, you fool.
Am just watching what you're doing to my brothers.
I'm Rakifi, And I'm not amused.
Once you angered me enough; I'll call the big one.
Your little weapons can't even cause a scratch.
name: Merlkin (Anti-Botter)
behaviour: He keeps distance from you and heals very fast each turn. He won't attack you if you aren't atacking him.
strategy: You are not meant to fight it.
